mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on yellow) Hatch poster announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Carl Smith, Porter Wagoner, Jimmy Newman, Mother Maybelle and the Carter Family, Jan Howard and others at the New West Plains High School Gym.
